ygData.subject: Re: How to learn a language
ygData.msgSnippet: The way I understand it, you can teach someone to 1 point better skill than yourself.  Then that person can teach you 2 points which puts you 1 point ahead,
ygData.messageBody:
The way I understand it, you can teach someone to 1 point better skill than
yourself. Then that person can teach you 2 points which puts you 1 point
ahead, repeat as necessary...

Ylandril <Soulforge>
High Elf Wizard of the 5th Initiate
Mithaniel Marr
